column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Brioche was flaky on the outside
column2: soft and chewy on the inside. Clumps of sugar added crunchiness
column3: nice. I wasn't terribly impressed. Other desserts looked very typical to any other bakery
column9: macarons. Dessert wise I was expecting something epic from this place like a friggin Cronut. I did bring this up to the staff and they were surprised they didn't think of making that in the first place. I'm hoping if they do make the Cronut
